resources.string: Branko Bajcetic is a Computing Science student at Simon Fraser University in Burnaby, B.C, Canada. This game is a project for SFU\'s Software Engineering (CMPT 276) course.\nWebpage: https://opencoursehub.cs.sfu.ca/jackt/grav-cms/cmpt276/home
"In Submarine Wars, you are a pilot, and it is your goal to try to destroy all of the enemy's submarines with the least amount of sonar missiles."
"Select a spot in the water grid to fire a missile, which will use sonar to find the number of nearby submarines."
"When selecting a grid spot, you'll either see a destroyed submarine, or if you miss, a number indicating the number of hidden submarines" "in the same row and column as this spot."
"Game Over: Once all submarines are destroyed, your score will be the number of missiles you launched. Try to get your score as low as possible!"
